title: Italy : natural gas imports 2018 , by country of origin
yAxis: Natural gas imports in million cubic meters
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Natural gas imports in million cubic meters in the y axis.
Country Russia has the highest Natural gas imports in million cubic meters and Holland has the lowest Natural gas imports in million cubic meters.
There is a difference of 31318.0 between the maximum Country Russia and minimum Country Holland.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Natural gas imports in million cubic meters in the y axis.
Country Russia has the highest Natural gas imports in million cubic meters and Holland has the lowest Natural gas imports in million cubic meters.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Natural gas imports in million cubic meters in the y axis.
Country Russia has the highest Natural gas imports in million cubic meters and Holland has the lowest Natural gas imports in million cubic meters.
There is a difference of 31318.0 between the maximum Country Russia and minimum Country Holland.
max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Natural gas imports in million cubic meters in each Country on the y axis.
The Natural gas imports in million cubic meters is appeared to be the highest at Country Russia and lowest at Country Holland.
Second maximum Natural gas imports in million cubic meters is found at Country Algeria.
The difference of Natural gas imports in million cubic meters between the highest and lowest Country is 31318.0.
The Country Russia has the highest Natural gas imports in million cubic meters, followed by Algeria, and Qatar. Down to the Country Holland which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Natural gas imports in million cubic meters in all 7 Countrys is roughly 9696.14.
The Natural gas imports in million cubic meters is 67873.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
